text: Udhar ek kafila aaya aur usne apne saqqe (water carrier) ko pani laney ke liye bheja. Saqqe(water carrier) ne jo kuwein mein dol (bucket) dala to (Yusuf ko dekh kar) pukar uttha “mubarak ho! yahan to ek ladka hai”. Un logon ne usko maal e tijarat samajh kar chupa liya, halanke jo kuch woh kar rahey thay khuda ussey bakhabar tha
